Html:
Hi everyone,

if got a question concerning ticks in a linegraph:

in my program i've got linegraphs connected to an ObservableCollection. When i add or remove entries in that collection, the axis and it's ticks change dynamicaly.

When there are few entries in that collection, the ticklabelss in the graph are overriding each other. When there are a lot of entries in the collection, the resolution of the ticklabelss is quiet poor.

 

Is there a way to define the minimum- and maximum-count of ticklabels.

 

Thanks for your help.

Regards

Akki
